snippet.title: Recettear - An Item Shop's Tale Trailer
snippet.description:
Recettear is the story of an item shop, the girl who lives in it, and the fairy who turned her life upside down. Recette Lemongrass finds herself in charge of an item shop built into her house, in order to pay back a loan her father took and then skipped out on - and Tear, her newfound fairy "companion", won't take no for an answer!

About 10,000 sales of the title in Western markets, the game was warmly received by critics and its reputation spread through word-of-mouth, leading to over 140,000 units sold to date and at the 2011 Independent Games Festival, Recettear was given two honorable mentions for the Seumas McNally Grand Prize and Excellence in Design categories. Now that's "CAPITALISM,﻿ HO!"

Get the free demo on steam
http://store.steampowered.com/app/70400
